titleStmt.title: Robin Hood and the beggar. Shewing; how Robin Hood and the beggar fought, and how he changed clothes with the beggar, and how he went a begging to Nottingham, and how he saved three brethren from being hang'd for stealing of deer. To the tune of, Robin Hood and the stranger.
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas, fl. 1672-1685.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
